idea: Pitch Books is a venture that has been working with startups globally to help create pitch decks, business plans, financial models for raising funds since 2014. It also helps connect them to investors for pitching their ideas and many have successfully raised funds through our documents and advisory. We also work with boutique investment banks in USA and Dubai to help with with information memorandums for M&A Activities. We are now in the process of developing AI based platform for these services.
